writings.title: The New Testament
writings.author: Various authors, 1st century
writings.description: The foundational texts of Christianity, including the Gospels, Acts, Epistles, and Revelation.

writings.title: The Didache
writings.author: Anonymous, late 1st–early 2nd century
writings.description: A manual of Christian ethics, worship, and church order, often referred to as 'The Teaching of the Twelve Apostles.'

writings.title: The Epistle of Barnabas
writings.author: Anonymous, early 2nd century
writings.description: A theological treatise emphasizing the fulfillment of Old Testament prophecies in Christ.

writings.title: Pliny the Younger (Epistles 10.96)
writings.author: Pliny the Younger, c. 112 AD
writings.description: A Roman governor’s letter describing early Christian worship practices, including hymn-singing and communal meals.
